name: Cloud Image Gallery
author: Md Rukon Shekh

sections.description:
Full documentaction here

Live Demo

Cloud image gallery is nice image gallery plugin.it is full responsive. it has 9 themes , Options page, custom css and more. please visit our demo page.

Features

  • Responsive
  • 9 Themes
  • Shortcode
  • Shortcode with category selector
  • Options page
  • full customizable
  • Custom css box
  • Dragable
  • Unlimited Image Upload
  • Pop-up Image box with image caption.
  • Nice animations
  • Auto play image gallery.

User By shortcode in your page or post

[cigallery]

and more..
Please visit our demo page.

Full documentaction here
sections.installation:
Installing Through Dashboard:

  1. Go to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload
  2. Choose the installable ZIP file (that you have download in your computer from wordpress.org) Upload that file.
  3. Now, click on activate link to activate the plugin.

Note : After install complte please go to the settings menu and click the \”Save\” Button
1 Cloud Gallery > Settings

Installing Through FTP:

  1. Extract the installable ZIP file (that you have download in your computer from wordpress.org) Upload the extracted folder into wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.

Note : After install complte please go to the settings menu and click the \”Save\” Button
1 Cloud Gallery > Settings
